page.title: 02A CHILDS HOME IN WALKINGTON.
page.content: FOR BREAKFAST WE LIKE CEREAL,TOAST AND BACON AND EGGS,WHICH MUM COOKS ON THE ELECTRIC COOKER AS THERE IS NO GAS IN WALKINGTON.WE EAT THIS IN THE KITCHEN BUT WE HAVE OUR OTHER MEALS IN THE DINING ROOM. IN THE LOUNGE WE ALL HAVE TELEVISIONS WHICH MOST OF US WATCH EARLY IN THE MORNING AND AGAIN IN THE EVENING.SOME OF US HAVE A VIDEO AND MANY A SECOND TELEVISION TO USE WITH A COMPUTER.FOR LUNCH WE LIKE SAUSAGE,BEANS,CHIPS, BREAD_ROLLS,SANDWICHES,CAKES AND ICE_ CREAM;FOR DINNER IN THE EVENING WE EAT CHICKEN OR BEEF WITH VEGETABLES. IN OUR HOUSES WE ALL HAVE IRONS, VACUUM_CLEANERS,FRIDGES AND WASHING MACHINES WHILST SEVERAL OF US HAVE DISHWASHERS,MICROWAVE_OVENS,FREEZERS, TYPEWRITERS,ELECTRIC SEWING MACHINES AND PIANOS.
